entry.content:
A youtube channel : Design Course

It is a very good youtube channel with amazing content. Every video is clear and concise. I like how everything is displayed and  explained. I started to watch a lot of its video today and I want to reproduce almost all of them. He makes a lot of design courses and dome design reviews. For everyone interested by webdesign and front end development, I recommend this channel!

entry.title: TIL - TID
entry.summary: By this new blog, I want to share what I learn every day and what I discovered. Tht's why you will see two types of articles: TIL for Today I Learnt and TID for Today I Discovered. It has two functions: it <ill help to remember…
entry.content:
By this new blog, I want to share what I learn every day and what I discovered. Tht's why you will see two types of articles: TIL for Today I Learnt and TID for Today I Discovered. 

It has two functions: it <ill help to remember what I can learn everyday and it wan help some people to discover new things as I discover them too. 

 

Enjoy!
